title: Manohari Gundla Haram - Pearl & Coral Delight
materials: Cubic Zirconia (CZ) Diamonds. Hyderabadi Polish for a lasting luster and rich
features: This exquisite Haram showcases a unique fusion of traditional and contemporary design. It features a series of geometrically shaped pendants, each centered with a vibrant coral stone and encircled by shimmering CZ diamonds. Delicate pearl drops dangle gracefully from each pendant, adding a touch of elegance and movement. The necklace is strung with a graduated series of pearl and diamond accents, culminating in a comfortable and secure fit. The setting is crafted with meticulous attention to detail, ensuring that each gemstone is perfectly showcased.
occasions: Perfect for special occasions such as weddings (Muhurtham)
and formal gatherings. Its understated elegance also makes it suitable for adding a touch of sophistication to contemporary attire.
description: This Manohari Gundla Haram is a testament to timeless beauty and superior craftsmanship. The combination of gold, pearls, coral, and CZ diamonds creates a captivating visual harmony. It is a statement piece that will be treasured for generations, carrying with it the cultural significance of traditional South Indian jewelry. The Hyderabadi Polish guarantees a long-lasting shine and durability.
